otherNames: How I Gain Stat Points in the Apocalypse, I Am Picking up Attributes and Items in Last Days, The Last Hero, 俺は拾ったスキルで末世を生き抜く, 刮痧战士, 我在末世捡属性, 좀비의 습격- 도시의 영웅
synopsis: No one is safe in the apocalypse, least of all a dorm supervisor who was forced to venture out into the zombie-infested world for survival. In a moment of crisis, Yang Hao obtains the “Stat Point (SP) Harvest System” and starts picking up strength, agility, and even mutated blood SP… Thus starts Yang Hao’s days of claiming all the food, beautiful women, and land that he could see. Bodies of mutants, evolved beasts, and ancient warriors lay in his wake as he forges a bloody path to become the King of the Apocalypse!
